name: Mahmood Neshati
content: Mahmood Neshati, PhD | Computer Science and Engineering Department, Shahid Beheshti University In The Name of God, The Compassionate, The Merciful Mahmood Neshati, Assistant Professor, Computer Science and Engineering Department Shahid Beheshti University Phone: (+9821) 29904191 Fax: (+9821) 29904128 Email: m_neshati[at]sbu[dot]ac[dot]ir Received his BS, MS and Ph.D. degrees in Software Engineering from the Sharif University of Technology, Tehran, Iran. During his Ph.D. program, he was a part-time lecturer in several universities in Iran. He was also a visiting researcher at Database group of Twente University, Enschede, the Netherlands in 2012. After graduation, Mahmood joined the Data Analytic group of Qatar Computing Research Institute (QCRI), Doha, Qatar as a research assistant. He is currently an assistant professor of Computer Science and Engineering  Department at Shahid Beheshti University.
